 ----- RunControl -----
&RUNCONTROL
 FILECODE="test                ",
 FILEINPUTPATH="./Input/                                                                                                                                              ",
 FILEOUTPUTPATH="./Output/                                                                                                                                             ",
 TSTEP=300        ,
 MULTIPLEMETFILES=0          ,
 MULTIPLEINITFILES=0          ,
 MULTIPLEESTMFILES=1          ,
 KEEPTSTEPFILESIN=1          ,
 KEEPTSTEPFILESOUT=0          ,
 WRITEOUTOPTION=1          ,
 RESOLUTIONFILESIN=3600       ,
 RESOLUTIONFILESOUT=3600       ,
 RESOLUTIONFILESINESTM=3600       ,
 CBLUSE=0          ,
 SNOWUSE=0          ,
 EMISSIONSMETHOD=1          ,
 NETRADIATIONMETHOD=3          ,
 ROUGHLENHEATMETHOD=2          ,
 ROUGHLENMOMMETHOD=2          ,
 SMDMETHOD=0          ,
 STABILITYMETHOD=3          ,
 STORAGEHEATMETHOD=1          ,
 OHMINCQF=0          ,
 WATERUSEMETHOD=0          ,
 DISAGGMETHOD=1          ,
 DISAGGMETHODESTM=1          ,
 RAINDISAGGMETHOD=100        ,
 RAINAMONGN=-999       ,
 MULTRAINAMONGN= 5*-999       ,
 MULTRAINAMONGNUPPERI= 5*-999.00000000000000      ,
 KDOWNZEN=0          ,
 SUPPRESSWARNINGS=1          ,

 DIAGNOSEDISAGG=0          ,
 DIAGNOSEDISAGGESTM=0          ,
